title: Can music and songs help with mental health? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’d say yes they can. Like anything in life, if you enjoy something, the pursuit of that can influence your emotional state. I know that if I get a song stuck in my head for days I enjoy that. I am a musician and I go over the way I’d play it or sing it, so it has a secondary value for me, but the actual occurrence of having music in my head is pleasing. Listening to music is also immensely pleasurable. How can these things which are so valued and important not make a positive difference? That goes for everyone who loves music in some form.
Music can uplift and immerse people in positive and hopeful attitudes.
